column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: flood. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix flood: <http://example.com/ontology/flood#> .flood:Flood rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Flood" ;    rdfs:comment "A high flow or overflow of water from a water body onto normally dry land" .flood:cause rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:label "cause" ;    rdfs:comment "Causes of Flood" ;    rdfs:domain flood:Flood ;    rdfs:range xsd:string .flood:affectedArea rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:label "affectedArea" ;    rdfs:comment "Area affected by the flood" ;    rdfs:domain flood:Flood ;    rdfs:range xsd:string .flood:duration rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:label "duration" ;    rdfs:comment "Duration of the flood" ;    rdfs:domain flood:Flood ;    rdfs:range xsd:duration .flood:severity rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:label "severity" ;    rdfs:comment "Severity of the flood" ;    rdfs:domain flood:Flood ;    rdfs:range xsd:string .```
